name: Xiamen International Airport Co., Ltd.
description: Xiamen International Airport Co., Ltd. operates Xiamen Gaoqi International Airport, one of the major airports in China, located in Xiamen, Fujian Province. Established in 1983, the airport serves as a key hub for both domestic and international flights, facilitating travel and trade in the region. The company is dedicated to providing safe, efficient, and high-quality airport services to passengers and airlines alike. With a focus on innovation and customer experience, Xiamen International Airport has invested in modernizing its facilities and expanding its routes. The airport features two terminals and is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to enhance security and streamline passenger flow. In recent years, the company has also embraced sustainability initiatives, aiming to reduce its environmental impact and promote green practices within airport operations. As a vital transportation gateway, Xiamen International Airport plays a crucial role in boosting tourism and commerce in the region, connecting Xiamen with major cities across China and around the world. The company's commitment to excellence in service and infrastructure development positions it as a leader in the aviation industry in China.
